column1: File:Gail McIntosh - Peril Returned.jpg - Peril Returned
For living or dark undead, I will smite you, if you touch him (Éowyn)
Undead were beings whom once had been alive (often Men) but which had been bestowed with an unnaturally prolonged existence. All such creatures seem to have been associated with Evil.
The undead were known by many names:
: The Undead is a class of monsters
2007-: The Lord of the Rings Online:
: The Dead is a category of creatures
column5: and many others.http://lorebook.lotro.com/wiki/Category:The_Dead Category:The Dead at http://lorebook.lotro.com Lorebook.lotro.com (accessed 18 December 2010) A related category is The Unseen
column6: which includes the Nazgûl and related shadowy figures.http://lorebook.lotro.com/wiki/Category:Unseen Category:Unseen at http://lorebook.lotro.com Lorebook.lotro.com (accessed 18 December 2010)
